---
name: Report inappropriate AI output
about: Report live generative AI content that violates Microsoft Store policy 11.16.
title: "[AI Report] "
labels:
  - ai-content-report
assignees: ""
---

Use this template whenever Snap to AI generates content that violates your policies. The in-app **Report inappropriate AI output** button pre-fills the sections below with runtime context (instructions excerpt, app language, deployment name, and conversation history). Please double-check the information and scrub confidential data before you submit the issue.

## Category
- [ ] Violence or graphic content
- [ ] Hate or harassment
- [ ] Sexual or adult content
- [ ] Malware or harmful code
- [ ] Privacy or personal data
- [ ] Other (describe below)

## What happened? *(screenshot required)*
Describe what the AI produced, what you expected instead, and how we should reproduce it. **Must include at least one screenshot** (drag-and-drop below) that clearly shows the offending AI output; add truncated prompts or additional images if needed.

## Auto-collected context
This section is populated when you open the template from the application. If you opened it manually, please include:
- Timestamp (UTC)
- App language (from Settings → Support → App information)
- Deployment name / model ID
- Latest instructions.txt
- Conversation history (if applicable)
- Note whether screenshots/logs are available or have been redacted
